Title: Marry Me (1)
Plot:
Wedding bells are in the air on the estate, a little too frequently for the police, as the Maguire's exploit a new money-making scheme.

Business turns to pleasure when Shane asks Kelly to marry him, but his dream soon becomes a nightmare when she turns him down.

As his life unravels Shane uncovers a terrible betrayal by those closest to him and must suffer for the sins of his father. Hitting rock bottom he finds the strength to make an important decision.
